_header: Sometime was in England a king of great fame
Subjects: Fremund, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Fremund in one MS of the South English Legendary

BLSto949.First Lines: Som tyme was in engelonde a king of grete fameþat gode man & swiþe wis offa was is name…
BLSto949.Last Lines: …Nou bidde we to seyn fremound & is help wel vasteHe sende vs to þe ioye þat euer more schal laste
BLSto949.Note: Ends “Amen” at end of last line.
